data.name: THE LAST HUMAN IS A BIKER
data.detailed_description:
THE LAST HUMAN IS A BIKER (TLH) offers an exciting and addictive video game experience for a few hours of pure entertainment. In this 2D shooter you play as John, the last human, and unleash his fury in his quest of vengeance! With a tremendous amount of item synergies, change your style every game and make the choices that will allow you to survive against countless swarms of aliens!

Post-apocalypse is for the best


2666, an alien invasion destroyed the USA. John is the only survivor, the last human. Embark in a vengeful adventure on the United States devastated roads, and destroy alien scums with big guns and tasty punchlines.

Shut up and take my punchlines


“Since it's the '90s, you don't just smack a guy in the face. You say something cool first.” - Joe Hallenbeck (Bruce Willis) in The Last Boy Scout.

This game is a tribute to 90s movies and series masterpiece, from THE RENEGADE to AKIRA, including MAD MAX and STARSHIP TROOPERS. Every breath you take, prepare for a shower of cultural references to awaken Nostalgia.

Drive - Kill - Die - Repeat


TLH combines shooter and runner mechanics to deliver a fast-paced gameplay, spiced up with rogue lite elements. The player's goal is to survive as long as possible while continuing his vengeful adventure on the devastated roads of the United States.

Upgrade your equipment, discover legendary recipes


Choose your starting weapon. Upgrade it with modules to combine their passive effects with no limit. These various and infinite combinations will make each game unique. Among all these recipes, you may end up building one of the secrets weapons with unique and legendary signatures.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 2200) or equivalent, AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 3600+ (2 * 1910) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7300 GT (512 MB), Radeon X1300 Pro (256 MB)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
